TopicTitle: Requesting extremely sci-fi craft for a story

Articles.Content:
As the title says, for one of my mission reports, this time Voyage: The Final Warning, I am in need of at least a few sci-fi spaceships. As I have spent hours on just one ship for the story, and I will need some hyper-advanced looking craft in the near future (but at the rate I write it may still be several months!), I thought I would ask here, based on the overwhelming number of responses I got in my previous craft request thread.

You will be credited in the chapter if you make a contribution, and maybe you can request a reference or cameo in the story, but I'm not completely sure on that part.

Rules/guidelines:

  • Any amount of sci-fi is okay. In the story, there are several different alien species, although only a few are important. They are all at different levels of technological progression. Some have warp drives, some still use conventional or nuclear.
  • The aliens also come in many different shapes and sizes. Some may be tiny, some huge. In addition the homeworlds of these species are varied. All ship sizes are welcome unless it gets outrageous.
  • In general, the more sci-fi, the better.
  • Most of the ships should be peaceful ships.
  • But I need a few warships. These should be the most futuristic and ominous of all of the ships.
  • These are aliens, not necessarily Kerbals, so mods are not only allowed, but encouraged.
  • Use as few stock parts as possible, actually, now that I think about it. Use the most unique and futuristic looking mod parts you can find.
  • That being said, try to keep the part count relatively low.
  • These craft do not have to function well if at all, their main purpose is to look good and maybe get blown up at some point. Sorry in advance for blowing them up!
  • If need be, especially with the super-high tech warships (the ones I need the most) you can handwave the propulsion systems and say they run on magic or something.

Thank you in advance for your help, this will take a long time if it's just me doing it.

On 10/19/2018 at 12:51 AM, Ultimate Steve said:

Heres a scifi-ish ship to start off with. High part count, but you could probably strip away the internals to make it lower in part count. https://kerbalx.com/qzgy/Grenadier
